alert.note: Alert for Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 06 at 2:26PM MST until November 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Northern Foot Hills and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
